entry.title: Bitcoin Core 0.12.0 release schedule
entry.summary: On September 24, 2015, Wladimir J. van der Laan via bitcoin-dev announced a feature freeze on the Bitcoin protocol for December 1, 2015. However, Luke questioned the absence of a "Consensus freeze" and suggested postponing it until after the HK workshop in case a hardfork was decided on. Luke also asked if the consensus freeze had been decoupled from the release process entirely since old versions required an update for it as well.
